title: Renaissance ClubSport Aliso Viejo Laguna Beach Hotel Entices Travelers With Exciting New Package
text: Renaissance ClubSport Aliso Viejo Laguna Beach Hotel Entices Travelers With Exciting New Package By PR Newswire | 09/02/15 - 01:11 PM EDT Reprint ALISO VIEJO, Calif. , Sept. 2, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- California travelers soak up the sun in style with special perks from Renaissance ClubSport Aliso Viejo Laguna Beach Hotel . Summer might be coming to an end, but fun in the sun is in full swing at one of the premier hotels in Aliso Viejo . Travelers that book a stay for three or more nights can take advantage of the Laguna Beach Enjoy Blue Skies Package and earn 1,500 Marriott Rewards Points when they arrive on a Thursday or Friday. Featuring rates from just $159 a night Aug. 20 - Nov. 8, 2015 , this special deal is the perfect excuse for families and friends to enjoy a weekend getaway in beautiful Southern California . With tons of exciting on-site amenities, the Laguna Beach hotel gives guests plenty of ways to make memories. Visitors looking for a relaxing retreat can enjoy a peaceful escape at R Spa . From revitalizing facials and massages to invigorating body scrubs and wraps, the on-site spa has everything guests need to renew mind, body and spirit. Following their treatments, spa-goers can head to the steam room or simply relax in the comfortable lounge areas. For a more active getaway, guests can take a refreshing dip in the sparkling outdoor pool , perfect for doing laps, making a splash or simply opting to soak up the sunshine in one of the plush lounge chairs surrounding the watering hole. Little ones will find endless fun of their own at the Splash Pad or Play Park, featuring a playground complete with exciting water sprayers and slides. Fuel up for adventures with a mouthwatering meal, healthy snack or smoothie at Citrus Fresh Grill. Conveniently located inside the hotel, the stylish eatery allows travelers to satisfy their cravings with fresh California Cuisine for breakfast, lunch and dinner. 1 of 3
